document_data.title: The Unforking Family Tree
document_data.author: [[Ed Greenwood]]
document_data.mainbody: '''"The Unforking Family Tree"''' is a short comedic story by [[Ed Greenwood]] set in [[Waterdeep]], based on a number of suggestions provided by attendees of [[Wikipedia:Gen Con|Gen Con]] 2013's ''Spin a Yarn with Ed Greenwood'' seminar, and published on the [[Wizards of the Coast]] website that same year.
